productName: SOHL Mattress in a Box - Queen
productTitle: SOHL Mattress in a Box - Queen
productDesc: Our Estelle mattress is expertly engineered with premium pocket spring technology, a layer of memory foam for enhanced support and a cushiony Euro pillow top for extra comfort. Finished in a polyester jacquard quilted fabric.
productDetailedDesc:
-Mattress comfort level: medium feeling.
-Mattress expands to full size once unpacked (Can not be repacked into box).
-Wheels and handle on the box for easy transport.
-Includes 12 month warranty.
-Queen Size Mattress: 2.03m(L) x 1.52m(W) x 24cm(H).
-Box Size: approx. 1.58m(L) x 32.5cm(D) x 32.5cm(H).
-Box Weight: approx. 41kg.
productDeliveryReturnsDesc:
Delivery

Currently delivering to selected postcodes in NSW, VIC & QLD. Your order will be dispatched within 1-2 business days and you will receive order updates via email with tracking details.


Returns

While we hope you'll be happy with your order, you can return a product to your nearest store or contact us via email to arrange. To check if you are eligible for a refund please refer to our Returns Policy.
